name: QrPngCanvasBadgeOptions
summary: Decorative badge/tab/ribbon options drawn outside the QR bounds.

properties.name: Position
properties.summary: Badge position relative to the QR bounds.

properties.name: WidthPx
properties.summary: Badge width in pixels (0 disables drawing).

properties.name: HeightPx
properties.summary: Badge height in pixels (0 disables drawing).

properties.name: GapPx
properties.summary: Gap between the QR bounds and the badge.

properties.name: OffsetPx
properties.summary: Offset along the edge (horizontal for top/bottom, vertical for left/right).

properties.name: TailPx
properties.summary: Ribbon tail length in pixels (applies to CodeGlyphX.Rendering.Png.QrPngCanvasBadgeShape.Ribbon).
